name: テーブル一覧
sql: select name from sqlite_master where type="table"

name: pokedexとカントー図鑑を結合
sql: SELECT * FROM pokedex JOIN kanto ON pokedex.no = kanto.globalNo AND pokedex.form = kanto.form AND pokedex.region = kanto.region AND pokedex.mega_evolution = kanto.mega_evolution AND pokedex.gigantamax = kanto.gigantamax

name: 全国図鑑Noで図鑑説明を検索
図鑑説明文をあいまい検索
sql: SELECT * FROM description WHERE description LIKE "%ノーベル%"
